snippet.title: Washington DC, Chicago, Pittsburgh--Examples Of NFL Frenzy
snippet.description: I spent last week in Washington DC and the area is ablaze with Redskin mania. Every cab driver, shopkeeper and person I encountered is in a state of excitement about the prospects of the team. RG III could be elected Mayor in a landslide. It is stunning to witness coming [...] read »

snippet.title: Pittsburgh Steelers 80th Anniversary Throwback Jerseys: You Be the Judge
snippet.description: Photo courtesy of @Steelers, the official Steelers Twitter feed By Andrea Hangst, Bleacher Report Oh my. The Pittsburgh Steelers have released their 80th anniversary throwback jerseys on Tuesday, and they are, in a word, unique. You may recall the most recent round of Steelers throwback jerseys, first debuted during their 75th anniversary season [...] read »

snippet.title: Shaq, the Pittsburgh Steelers and Sports Leagues Adapt To Shifts in Social Media To Build Brand Power
snippet.description: The face of social media is changing. While once largely text-driven, social media sites are becoming more image-based, allowing users to upload pictures and share videos with the click of a button. This image-based shift in social media is largely due to the birth of image-sharing websites like Instagram and [...] read »

snippet.title: Retiring From The NFL At 26, Rashard Mendenhall Is Heading Into "Halftime"
snippet.description: Rashard Mendenhall, an NFL running back, has announced his retirement at age 26. It comes, he says, at a point in time when he is drawn to focusing on personal interests that have always “spread a lot further than the acceptable athletic stereotypes and conformity.” Is he part of a growing trend? read »
